source:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_00<tab>Little Yang seems quite eager to review your findings, likely because he was not listening the first time.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

廃屋敷の陽気なゴースト人形は、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_01<tab>Upon deliberation, you conclude that the memo mentioned by the mummers should indeed indicate the current location of the pumpkin suspected to be T'maritaa, and that the most expedient way to confirm this is to visit room 201.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

陽気なゴースト人形と話した。怪しい道化師たちから聞いた情報を元に、行方不明者の居場所に関するメモが201号室に隠されている可能性があることを推測した。201号室で「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA2001 /var>」を探そう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_02<tab>The memo, conveniently not hidden in the least, contains a hint as to where the suspect pumpkin may be found. Little Yang also provides you with subliming scalebombs, which he assures you will remove any foul transformation magicks that may have been applied to said pumpkin.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_02<tab>201号室で<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA2001 /var>を見つけた。道化師たちが話していたメモに間違いないだろう。道化師のメモの内容をヒントに、廃屋敷の地下で行方不明者の居場所を突き止め、「不自然なカボチャ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E3D01 /var>」を使おう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_03<tab>To your─but mostly Little Yang's─surprise, the subliming scalebomb reveals not T'maritaa, but a Hyuran male of middle age dressed as a werewolf. He understandably flees in terror upon seeing a screaming Little Yang, and must be located once more if you are to understand how he became a jealously guarded gourd.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_03<tab>不自然なカボチャに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E3D01 /var>を使った。カボチャの呪いは解けたが、現れたのは行方不明の女の子ではなかった。廃屋敷の地下で、陽気なゴースト人形に驚いて逃げ出してしまった「狼に仮装した男性」を追いかけよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_04<tab>As you speak with the man─Dawkin─who else should appear but T'maritaa, who thankfully remains a Miqo'te. According to the pair's tale, Dawkin came upon a member of the Continental Circus attempting to curse T'maritaa, and dove in front of her to shield her from a vegetative fate. Though she managed to escape unscathed, she was unable to leave the manor due to fear of recapture, and opted to hide instead. With the two reunited and the coast clear, they are finally free to return to the outside world.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_04<tab>狼に仮装した男性に話しかけた。彼はドーキンという名のようだ。ほどなくして、近くで隠れていたチャ・マリターが元気に飛び出してきた。ドーキンはチャ・マリターを道化師たちの魔法からかばい、代わりにカボチャの姿にされていたのだった。何はともあれ、無事にふたりを救出できたことを、108号室の「陰気なゴースト人形」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_05<tab>You relay the whole curious tale to Little Yin, who mainly seems pleased to have the mystery over and done with. She does, however, invite you to return to the manor to visit.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_05<tab>陰気なゴースト人形に事の顛末を報告した。ゴースト人形たちは、行方不明者たちを無事に救出できたことに安堵し、冒険者に感謝した。グリダニアのミィ・ケット野外音楽堂に戻り、「冒険者ギルドの調査員」にも報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_06<tab>Back at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre, you report to the Adventurers' Guild Investigator. He is pleased that the crisis has been averted, but advises you to keep an eye on the Continental Circus.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SEQ_06<tab>冒険者ギルドの調査員に報告した。異変は無事に解決したが、引き続き冒険者ギルドは、コンチネンタル・サーカスの監視を続けていくそうだ。ゴースト人形たちと、再び仮装パーティー会場を見回るのもいいだろう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TODO_00<tab>Search room 201.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TODO_00<tab>201号室の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA2001 /var>を調べる

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TODO_01<tab>Use a subliming scalebomb on the peculiar pumpkin.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TODO_01<tab>地下牢の不自然なカボチャに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E3D01 /var>を使う

target:

冒険者ギルドの調査員に報告

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_000<tab>Good work out there! I mean, I suppose I don't know how your work was, exactly, since I've been here the whole time and all, but you seem like someone who would do good work! So let's review! The...work! That you did!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((オネーサン)) ((オニーサン)) /var>お手柄、お手柄！
それで例のカボチャとか、201号室って……どういうこと？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_001<tab><sigh> If you had been paying attention, you would know that our friend here tricked the mummers into revealing a room number─201─and the existence of a memo regarding a pumpkin significant enough to be kept under guard.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_001<tab>ふむ……<var 08 E905 ((お姉さん)) ((お兄さん)) /var>が聞いた情報を整理すると、
201号室のどこかに、特別なカボチャに関するメモがあり、
そのカボチャがある部屋は、奴らが見張る必要のある場所……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_002<tab>I see! So that means... Actually, I lied! I have no idea what's going on.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_002<tab>おおお、なるほどね！
……で、つまりどういうこと？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_Q1_000_000<tab>何と推理する？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_A1_000_001<tab>That memo holds information on the missing girl's whereabouts.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_A1_000_001<tab>行方不明者の手がかりはそのメモにある

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_A1_000_002<tab>The mummers have an unsettling obsession with pumpkins.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_A1_000_002<tab>道化師たちはカボチャが大好きだ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_003<tab>Yes, I quite agree.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_003<tab>さすが<var 08 E905 ((お姉さん)) ((お兄さん)) /var>。
ボクもまったくの同意見です……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_004<tab>I'll give you the benefit of the doubt and assume that you're being obtuse on purpose. But on the off chance that there are <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> total imbeciles in the room, I'll put this plainly─we need to find that memo.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_004<tab>やれやれ、頭の方は陽気な相棒と似たり寄ったりでしたか……。
ボクの推理によれば、その道化師のメモこそが、
行方不明者の手がかりなのですがね……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_005<tab>Oh! So the pumpkin...the pumpkin is...the little girl? Oh no! This is terrible!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_005<tab>それって、もしかして！
もう女の子がカボチャにされた可能性があるってこと！？
わわわ、早く見つけてあげなきゃ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_006<tab>Indeed. Which means that you two should investigate room 201 posthaste and see if you can locate the memo. Off you go.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_006<tab>とにかく、201号室で「道化師のメモ」を見つけましょう……。
ボクは何かあった時のために、ここに待機していますね……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_010<tab>Hey, look! A thing! Doesn't this look like the thing we're looking for?
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_010<tab>おおっ、何か落ちてる！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>The conspicuous memo contains notes scrawled in an unpracticed hand.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>誰かが書き殴ったようなメモを見つけた。

source:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_110_010<tab>(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Ahriman
Room Number = Eyes
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_110_010<tab>(-道化師のメモ-)地下牢のカボチャ
アーリマン
部屋番号は魔物の目の数

source:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_120_010<tab>(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat
Room Number = Eyes
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_120_010<tab>(-道化師のメモ-)地下牢のカボチャ
バット
部屋番号は魔物の目の数

source:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_130_010<tab>(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Ahriman + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_130_010<tab>(-道化師のメモ-)地下牢のカボチャ
アーリマン　サキュバス
部屋番号は魔物の目の数

TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_140_010<tab>(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Succubus

TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_140_010<tab>(-道化師のメモ-)地下牢のカボチャ
バット　サキュバス
部屋番号は魔物の目の数

TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_150_010<tab>(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Ahriman + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_150_010<tab>(-道化師のメモ-)地下牢のカボチャ
バット　アーリマン　サキュバス
部屋番号は魔物の目の数

source:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_160_010<tab>(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Succubus + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_160_010<tab>(-道化師のメモ-)地下牢のカボチャ
バット　サキュバス　サキュバス
部屋番号は魔物の目の数

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_011<tab>This has to be the one. It says “pumpkin” on it and everything!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_011<tab>おおっ！
地下牢のカボチャだって！
それってそれって、道化師たちが言ってたメモに間違いないよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_012<tab>Now we just need to count some eyeballs! You can do that, right? You seem like a great eyeball-counter.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_012<tab>う～～～ん、ムムム？
部屋番号……目の数って、メモに書いてある魔物の目？
う－……魔物に詳しそうな<var 08 E905 ((オネーサン)) ((オニーサン)) /var>、わかる？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_013<tab>Oh, and the eyeballs reminded me of these other balls! The pumpkin-headed lady gave them to me. They're subliming smokebombs that can break any skinchanger curse.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_013<tab>あ、そうそう、忘れるところだった！
そのメモに書かれた地下牢をハッケンしたら、
「不自然なカボチャ」に向かってコレを使ってね！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_014<tab>Just throw one at any old jack-o'-lantern you see, and it will turn back into its original form. Unless its original form was a pumpkin. Then it will stay the same!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_014<tab>たいていの呪いは、その「幸せの煙玉」を使えば解けるって、
カボチャ頭のオバサンが言ってたよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_015<tab>That little girl must be so scared. Hurry and find the room─I'll be right behind you. Oh, but not in a haunting way! In a helpful way!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_015<tab>女の子、きっと怖い想いしてるよね……今助けに行くからね！
さあ、<var 08 E905 ((オネーサン)) ((オニーサン)) /var>！
ゴーだよゴー！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_000_016<tab>Decoding the memo and checking its solution against the Cellarage room numbers on your map will allow you to quickly locate the transformed captive amongst the plethora of suspicious pumpkins in the manor.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_000_016<tab>「道化師のメモ」に書かれた暗号を解読することで、
カボチャにされた女の子を早く見つけられるかもしれない……。
マップを開いて、地下室の部屋番号と照らし合わせてみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_017<tab>Did you figure out what room in the cellarage we need? I think it has something to do with the total number of eyeballs! Oh, but you probably knew that, since you seem like someone who would be good at understanding memos.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_017<tab>「道化師のメモ」の意味、わかった？
私のカンだと、地下に何かありそうな感じがするよ！
魔物の目の数は……うーん、部屋番号と関係あるのかなあ？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_018<tab>Just remember to use the subliming scalebombs when you find the right pumpkin. Otherwise you'll just be standing there, staring at a pumpkin! Which isn't so different from what I used to do every day, come to think of it.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_018<tab>そうそう！
「不自然なカボチャ」をハッケンしたら「幸せの煙玉」を使ってね！
きっと、女の子の呪いが解けるはずだよ！

source:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_000_019<tab>(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Ahriman
Room Number = Eyes
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_000_019<tab>(-道化師のメモ-)地下牢のカボチャ
アーリマン
部屋番号は魔物の目の数

TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_140_019<tab>(-Mummer's Memo-)Pumpkin─Cellarage
Bat + Succubus + Succubus
Room Number = Eyes
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_140_019<tab>(-道化師のメモ-)地下牢のカボチャ
バット　サキュバス　サキュバス
部屋番号は魔物の目の数

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>As the smoke clears, the pumpkin remains a mere festive gourd...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>どうやら、ただのカボチャ飾りのようだ……。
再度「道化師のメモ」をヒントに部屋を特定し、
「不自然なカボチャ」に「幸せの煙玉」を使おう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_021<tab>I knew that you would be skilled at pumpkin identification! And you did it, you saved the little...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_021<tab>さっすが<var 08 E905 ((オネーサン)) ((オニーサン)) /var>！
これで女の子を無事救出だねー！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_022<tab>...Wait, what?
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_022<tab>………………え？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_023<tab>(-???-)I can finally stretch my legs again! I finally <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> legs again. Ahhh...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_023<tab>(-？？？？-)おっ！
やっと変身が解け……

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_024<tab>Aaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_024<tab>ぎゃあああああーーーーーー！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_025<tab>Aaaaaahhh!!!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_025<tab>(-？？？？-)うおおおお！？
お、お化けーーー！？
ひえええ、た、助けてくれーーーーー！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_026<tab>O-Oh gods, the little girl turned into a large man! It's terrible! It's dreadful! It's the greatest travesty this world has ever seen!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_026<tab>うわわわわわ！
呪いのせいで女の子がオッサンになっちゃった！？
ど、どうしよう、大惨事！！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_Q2_000_000<tab>何と声をかける？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_A2_000_001<tab>You shouldn't judge based on appearances, you know.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_A2_000_001<tab>オッサンになった理由があるはずだ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_A2_000_002<tab>I'm pretty sure that's a different person.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_A2_000_002<tab>別の行方不明者だろう

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_027<tab>You're right. Quick, let's go ask if we should be screaming or not!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_027<tab>そ、そうだね……！
きき、気を取り直して、オッサンの女の子を追いかけよう！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_028<tab>Oh, that does make more sense, come to think of it! Well, even if he isn't the girl we're looking for, we should probably follow him, don't you think?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_028<tab>そ、そうか、なるほど……！
とにかく、逃げ出したオッサンを追いかけよう！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_029<tab>I found him! I'm helping!
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_029<tab>まさかオッサンが出てくるなんて……！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_030<tab>Augh! Ghost stalker! Alright, Dawkin, keep it together...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_030<tab>わっ！？
さっきのお化け！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_031<tab>(-Dawkin-)Wait a minute, I know you. I apologize for my outburst─I'm a little on edge. One minute I was enjoying the masquerade, you see, and the next I'm a pumpkin in a dungeon. It's a bit much to take in.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_031<tab>(-ドーキン-)おや？　君とは……たしか以前も会っているね？
私は仮装パーティーに参加していた、ドーキンというものさ！
いやはや、先ほどは取り乱してすまなかったね！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_100_031<tab>(-Dawkin-)Wait a minute, you're neither a ghost nor a stalker, are you? You're just an adventurer. My apologies─I'm a little on edge. One minute I was enjoying the masquerade, you see, and the next I'm a pumpkin in a dungeon. It's a bit much to take in.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_100_031<tab>(-ドーキン-)おや？　君は、冒険者かな……？
いやはや、先ほどは取り乱してすまなかったね！
私は仮装パーティーに参加していた、ドーキンというものさ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_032<tab>Dawkin!
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_032<tab>ドーキンおじさん！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_033<tab>(-Dawkin-)Oh, little T'maritaa! You're considerably less orange than I was a moment ago, so I take that to mean that you've been safe in your hiding place all this time?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_033<tab>(-ドーキン-)おおっ、君はさっきの女の子！
無事だったかい？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_034<tab>Yep, I'm the best hider! There's not a fiend who's found me yet!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_034<tab>うん！
おじさんが、かばってくれたおかげだよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_035<tab>Hello, I'm confused!
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_035<tab>ど、どういうこと！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_036<tab>Well, mister ghost, I was looking around this big scary mansion for good hide-and-seek spots when one of the people from the Circus saw me and started casting a spell on me─I know because it's happened before. Dawkin jumped in front of me, but he got turned into a pumpkin!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_036<tab>えっとね、
私が変な人たちに、魔法をかけられそうになったとき、
ドーキンおじさんが私をかばって逃がしてくれたの！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_037<tab>I ran away, and I wanted to go and get help, but there were too many people from the troupe guarding the way out...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_037<tab>そのせいで、おじさんがカボチャにされちゃって……。
助けを呼びに行こうと思ったんだけど、
見張っている人がいて、ここから出られなかったの。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_038<tab>(-Dawkin-)Me, I just happened to be lost in the cellarage when I came upon that mummer casting the curse on her─not that I knew it was a curse at the time, mind, but it seemed right ominous─so I shielded her without a second thought. And then I was a pumpkin! Funny how these things happen, eh?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_038<tab>(-ドーキン-)たまたま地下に迷い込んでしまった時に出くわしてね。
とっさに体が動いたってやつさ！
はっはっは！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_039<tab>(-Dawkin-)Unfortunately, I wasn't much good to anyone after that. You must've been scared out of your wits all alone down here.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_039<tab>(-ドーキン-)お嬢ちゃん、怖かっただろう？
私たちが来たからには、もう安心さ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_040<tab>Don't worry, I was fine! These nice brooms kept me company while I hid.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_040<tab>ううん！
隠れている間、このホウキさんたちが遊んでくれたから、
全然怖くなかったの！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_041<tab>Thank you for coming to save me again, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var> adventurer! And you too, mister ghost!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_000_041<tab><var 08 E905 ((おねえさん)) ((おにいさん)) /var>、また会えてうれしいなぁ！
それに、探しに来てくれてありがとう！
こっちのお化けのお人形さんも！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_100_041<tab>Thank you for coming to save us, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var> adventurer! And you too, mister ghost!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_TMARITAA_100_041<tab><var 08 E905 ((おねえさん)) ((おにいさん)) /var>、
探しに来てくれてありがとう！
こっちのお化けのお人形さんも！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_042<tab>(-Dawkin-)My thanks as well. I would've hated to be stuck as a jack-o'-lantern forever. Just sitting there decoratively, serving no purpose...
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_042<tab>(-ドーキン-)君たちのおかげで助かったよ、本当にありがとう！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_043<tab>(-Dawkin-)Anyway, I'd be more than happy to escort T'maritaa here home to her mother. Hopefully next time we meet, I won't be a useless ornament! Haha!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_DAWKIN_000_043<tab>(-ドーキン-)それでは、彼女のことは私が責任をもって、
お母さんのところに連れて帰らせてもらおう……。
では、失礼するよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_044<tab>Wow, that was weird! And slightly offensive! But I'm glad that they're safe and everything worked out, you know, because when the pumpkin turned into a middle-aged man it was so scary and I thought we were in for a terrible tragedy for sure, but─ Oh, do you think we're supposed to tell Yin?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_044<tab>なんだか、ちょー予想外の展開だったね！
とにかく、ふたりとも無事でよかった、よかった！
戻って「陰気なゴースト人形」にも教えてあげよう！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_050<tab>It certainly was surreal seeing a pumpkin come to life like that. But now that the mystery is solved, we can go back to reveling!
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_050<tab>イロイロ予想外だったけど、結果オーライだよね！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_051<tab>The little girl turned into <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_051<tab>お、お、女の子がおじさんにーーー！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_052<tab>Oh. Oh, I see. <sigh> Well, what matters is that everything turned out in the end.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_052<tab>え……あ……そういうことですか……はぁ。
とにかく……ふたりとも無事でよかったですね。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_053<tab>And it's all thanks to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It was really fun talking to you, and joking with you, and panicking with you, and running around with you! Come to think of it, I don't think I've ever had so much fun...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_053<tab><var 08 E905 ((オネーサン)) ((オニーサン)) /var>、協力してくれてありがとう！
一緒に考えたり、笑ったり、驚いたり、
こんなこと初めてだから、ちょー楽しかったよー！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_054<tab><sigh> And now that it's over, I can finally have some peace and quiet. The manor will be empty once again. And perhaps we must return to silence, as well. Not that I mind, but...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_054<tab>ボクたちが動いたり喋ったりできるのも、
今のうちだけでしょうからね……はぁ……。
静かにできるからボクはいいんですけど……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_055<tab>Do come and see us again.
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_055<tab>……また、会いにきてくださいね。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_056<tab>Ahem. Yes, that's quite enough for now. Wasn't someone waiting to hear from you?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_056<tab>………………コホン。
「冒険者ギルドの調査員」の方も、待っているでしょう……。
ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂に戻って報告するといいですよ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_060<tab>You can come back and talk to me any time! But for now you should talk to that suspicious man outside!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_CHEERFULGHOST03169_000_060<tab>「冒険者ギルドの調査員」のオニーサンにも、
報告してあげたほうがいいよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_061<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_061<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_IMPHEAD_000_062<tab>My pumpkin has vanished, you say? How could this be?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_IMPHEAD_000_062<tab>キィィ……そんなバカな……。
例のカボチャが消えていたですと……！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_063<tab>Aha, there you are! I was delighted to hear that you managed to rescue the girl, even without reinforcements. The less the Impresario knows of our resources, the better.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_063<tab>おお、おかえりなさい！
救出されたふたりから、話は聞いていますよ。
さすがは冒険者、お手柄です！

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_064<tab>And perhaps the troupe's failure to keep ahold of their prey will give them cause to doubt the wisdom of their plans. We can only hope─and keep a close watch, of course.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_064<tab>人質にしていた者に逃げられたとなれば、
サーカスの連中にしても、これ以上、同じ手は使わないでしょう。
これで、一安心といったところですね。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_065<tab>I will remain at my post here, vigilant as always. If you could keep an eye on goings-on within the manor itself, I'd be grateful.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_065<tab>もちろん、私たち冒険者ギルドも、
コンチネンタル・サーカスの監視を続けていくつもりです。
あなたも、もし良かったら廃屋敷を見回ってくれると助かります。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_066<tab>Hm, but what to do about the <var 1A 02 /var>other<var 1A 01 /var> issue...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_INVESTIGATOR03169_000_066<tab>うーむ……それにしても、
あの妙なうわさ話はいったいなんだろう……？
あとで冒険者に相談してみるのも手か……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_PUMPKIN_000_067<tab>It is fitting that you bring the little ones delight, for they have watched over you for longer than you know. Heh heh heh...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_PUMPKIN_000_067<tab>クス……クスクス……。
いつもはジッと見守ってばかりの人形たちも、
今日はとっても楽しそうだったわ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_PUMPKIN_000_068<tab>As for how the brooms that made the girl their playmate came to move, even I cannot say, for it was no magic of mine. But no matter.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_PUMPKIN_000_068<tab>ところで、女の子と楽しそうに遊んでいたホウキたちは、
魔法も無しに、いったいどうして動いていたのかしらね？
クスクス……不思議がいっぱいの守護天節……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_PUMPKIN_000_069<tab>At the grand masquerade of All Saints' Wake, adventurers, monsters, and silent watchers are as one.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_PUMPKIN_000_069<tab>楽しいパーティーを守ってくれた<var 08 E905 ((貴女)) ((貴方)) /var>には、
イタズラ好きのお人形をプレゼント。
ヒトも魔物も、人形も、みんなが楽しい夜がイチバンね……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_PUMPKIN_000_070<tab>Permit us our mischief, and we might just follow you home...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW503_03171_PUMPKIN_000_070<tab>またどこかで、お会いできる日を楽しみにしているわ……。
さようなら……クスクス……。
